鶿字的基本解释

鶿
cí
同“鹚”。

鶿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cí］
［《廣韻》疾之切，平之，從。］
［《廣韻》子之切，平之，精。］
“鹚1”的繁体字。亦作“鶿1”。
见“鸕鷀”、“鷀”。

鶿字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鶿； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1497第04
【廣韻】疾之切【集韻】【韻會】牆之切【正韻】才資切，?音兹。鸕鷀，水鳥。【埤雅】鳥似鶂而黑。一名鷧。【爾雅·釋鳥】鶿鷧。【郭註】鸕鷀也。李時珍曰：韻書盧與兹皆黑也。此鳥色深黑，故名。鷧者，其聲自呼也。又名水老鴉。又名烏鬼。【夔州圖經】夔州人以鸕鶿捕魚，謂之烏鬼。【杜甫·遣悶詩】家家養烏鬼。【楊孚異物志】鸕鶿能沒於深水，取魚而食之，不生卵，而孕雛於池澤，旣胎而又吐生，多者生七八，少生五六，相連而出，若絲緒。【正字通】鸕鶿，俗呼慈老，人畜之，以繩約其嗉，才通小魚，其大魚不可下，時呼而取之，復遣去。觜曲如鉤，喉熱如湯，魚入喉卽爛，味不美。又【廣韻】子之切【集韻】津之切，?音孜。義同。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鹚; Kangxi strokes: 21; Page number: page 1497 04
[Guangyun] Cut of the disease [Jiyun] [Rhyme] Cut of the wall [Zhengyun] Only talented cut,? Yinz. Cormorant, water bird. 【Piya】The bird looks like a phoenix and black. A 鷧. 【Erya·Shiniao】Cormorants. [Guo Note] Cormorants are also. Li Shizhen said: Lu and Zi are both black in the rhyme book. This bird is dark black, hence the name.鷧者, his voice calls himself too. Also known as Shui Laoya. Also known as the goblin. [Kuizhou Picture Classics] Kuizhou people fish with cormorants, which is called the crow ghost. [Du Fu·Qianmong Poems] Every family raises crow ghosts. [Yang Fu Foreign Body History] Cormorants can submerge in deep water, take fish and eat them, without laying eggs, but the chicks are pregnant in Chize, fetuses and vomiting, the more ones give birth to seven or eight, and the few give birth to five or six, and they come out together. , Ruosixu. [Zhengzitong] The cormorant is commonly called the old man, the human and the animal, and the rope is used to tie it to the small fish, and the big fish can not be downloaded, and they are taken from time to time and sent back. The song is like a hook, the throat is hot like soup, the fish gets rotten in the throat, and the taste is not good. And [Guangyun] Zizhiqi [Jiyun] Jinzhiqi,? Yinzi. The same meaning.
